entry.title: Big Brands Must Be 'as Crypto-Native as Possible' Entering NFT Space: Gmoney
entry.summary: Gmoney's experience in the NFT space has been one of learning and iterating, something that some "legacy" brands have a hard time adopting.

entry.title: 'Calladita' Director: NFT Film Funding Model Out of Date, 'The Space Moves So Rapidly'
entry.summary: Director Miguel Faus "wouldn't recommend" that other filmmakers duplicate his NFT fundraising approach exactly, as the space has already evolved.

entry.title: NFT Startup Candy Digital Taps Getty Images for '70s Music and Photos
entry.summary: The Gary Vee-backed startup continues its shift beyond sports-themed collectibles.

entry.title: White House Will ‘Continue Monitoring’ Silvergate Bank Reports: Press Secretary
entry.summary: Karine Jean-Pierre refused to comment on the specifics of Silvergate’s situation, pointing to recent regulatory guidelines issued to US banks.

entry.title: Blockasset Athlete NFTs Drop Solana for Chiliz Sports Platform
entry.summary: Another popular project leaves the blockchain once called the "Ethereum killer."

entry.title: NFT Collector Gmoney: 'Marketplaces Have Nothing to Trade Without Creators'
entry.summary: Pseudonymous NFT collector Gmoney talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about his Web3 luxury brand 9dcc, big brands getting into NFTs, the debate over creator royalty fees, and what will come next to the space.

entry.title: Head of Product for IEX's Dispatch: 'We See Tokens as the Social Graph of Web3'
entry.summary: Dispatch is a new Web3 marketing, messaging, and ad tech tool from IEX, the exchange fighting high-frequency trading and made famous in the book "Flash Boys" by Michael Lewis. Dispatch head of product Sean Spector sat down with Decrypt's Liam Kelly at NFT Paris to talk about Dispatch's product vision and why Web2 companies are jumping into Web3.

entry.title: Yuga Twelvefold Bitcoin NFT Auction Raises $16.5 Million
entry.summary: The company’s collection of 300 generative art pieces garnered over 3,000 bids in 24 hours.

entry.title: What is a Sovereign Rollup? Rollkit Pitches Second Layer for Bitcoin
entry.summary: Whether or not it's novel, it's another Bitcoin tool inspired by Ordinals.

entry.title: Hermès Seeks Stronger Block of MetaBirkins NFT Sales
entry.summary: After a legal victory against the NFT collection for trademark infringement, Hermès is asking a judge to force the collection offline permanently.

entry.title: Voyager Bankruptcy Judge Has Harsh Words for SEC's Objection to Binance Deal
entry.summary: The securities regulator has until tomorrow morning to come up with a more convincing argument against Voyager’s restructuring plan.

entry.title: Alameda Sues Grayscale Over $9 Billion Locked in Bitcoin Trust Shares
entry.summary: The FTX aliffiliate claims that Grayscale’s “improper” fund freeze means that customer cash has been lost.

entry.title: Justice Department Pushes for Independent Investigation of FTX Collapse
entry.summary: The U.S. trustee appointed by the Department of Justice in the FTX bankruptcy case has filed an appeal in support of an independent examiner.

entry.title: gm: Neal Stephenson Maps Out the Metaverse
entry.summary: Neal Stephenson coined the term “metaverse” in his seminal 1992 sci-fi hit novel “Snow Crash.” Now he’s helming a metaverse blockchain company called Lamina1 and advocating for one free and open metaverse. He spoke to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves at length about what he got right and wrong in “Snow Crash,” goggles and flat screens, Big Tech, NFTs and digital ownership, and more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Crypto Market Cycles Are the 'Main Driver' of Industry Innovation: Fireblocks Web3 Lead
entry.summary: Fireblocks Web3 lead Omer Amsel says bear markets lead to better products.

entry.title: SEC Shuts Down '$100 Million Crypto Fraud' in Miami
entry.summary: The investment advisor allegedly commingled customer funds and used millions to make "Ponzi-like payments."

entry.title: Fireblocks Is Laser-Focused on the Picks and Shovels: Web3 Products Lead at ETH Denver
entry.summary: Omer Amsel, head of Web3 products at crypto custody and settlement provider Fireblocks, told Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver about why crypto market cycles are best for building, how Fireblocks is focused on providing "picks and shovels," and why the company still believes in the long-term promise of Web3.

entry.title: Dogecoin Drops 10% on the Week as Elon Musk Turns Attention to AI
entry.summary: As meme coin promoter Musk turns his attention from crypto to AI, Dogecoin appears to bearing the brunt of this week's losses.

entry.title: CEO of Video Streaming Platform Beem: Decentralization Lets 'Creators Regain Their Autonomy'
entry.summary: Mihai Crasneanu, Co-founder and CEO of Beem, describes Beem as "a mix of YouTube, Twitch, Zoom, and Clubhouse" that runs as a decentralized platform. He talked to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how it all works and how the platform is growing.

entry.title: Demand for Blockchain Devs Is Soaring—But Not Just in Crypto
entry.summary: Despite recent crypto layoffs, prospects for blockchain developers may be set to hold strong according to some in the hiring industry.

entry.title: Babel Finance Mulls New Token Launch to Repay Creditors
entry.summary: Embattled crypto broker Babel Finance is exploring the launch of a new DeFi token to resolve the company’s financial woes.

entry.title: Critic Says Yuga Labs Bitcoin NFTs Auction Sets 'Really Bad Precedent’
entry.summary: Yuga Labs' Bitcoin-based NFT offering implements a primitive auction technique to launch the TwelveFold NFT collection.

entry.title: 'Calladita' Director Says NFT Funding Model He Used Is Already Gone Because Web3 Moves So Fast
entry.summary: Miguel Faus funded his upcoming film "Calladita" via NFT sales and a prize grant from Decentralized Pictures and Steven Soderbergh. He told Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how the film process is progressing and how Web3 moves so quickly that the NFT funding model he used is already a thing of the past and other filmmakers need to find other ways to keep pushing the envelope.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Wants to Watch Netflix and Read Crypto News While Awaiting Trial
entry.summary: The U.S. Attorney submitted a new request to limit the websites and online services Sam Bankman-Fried can use.

entry.title: User-Generated Content Can Stabilize Digital Economies, Says ‘Snow Crash’ Author
entry.summary: Neal Stephenson believes creators are key to building “priceless” things that people will HODL.

entry.title: PancakeSwap Version 3 Is Coming to BNB Smart Chain
entry.summary: The April upgrade promises more competitive trading fees and improved liquidity provisioning.

entry.title: Binance Team Fretted Over Binance US Ties, Tried to Recruit Gary Gensler: WSJ
entry.summary: A Telegram group chat reveals the Binance team's skittishness over regulatory scrutiny.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Lawyers Lay Into SEC, Elon Musk Cools on Crypto
entry.summary: Visa’s head of crypto this week emphatically denied that the payments giant was pausing its crypto push.

entry.title: Coinbase Protocols Lead Talks Plans for Base and NFT Marketplace
entry.summary: Coinbase protocols lead Jesse Pollak sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at ETH Denver 2023 to talk about the company's innovation strategy and its plans to keep "iterating quickly" on products like Coinbase NFT and its newly announced Layer-2 blockchain Base and its efforts to become an "on-chain-native company."

entry.title: Charitable Crypto Giving Continues Through Bear Market
entry.summary: Crypto donations still buoy humanitarian relief efforts in disaster and war zones.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: First Two Weeks of Straight Losses in 2023, Bitcoin and Ethereum Dip
entry.summary: The IMF’s managing director this week told a journalist that banning crypto “should not be taken off the table.”

entry.title: Coinbase ‘Iterating Quickly’ on NFT Marketplace Despite Lackluster Rollout: Protocols Head
entry.summary: Jesse Pollak says the publicly traded crypto exchange will continue to push the envelope.

entry.title: Gitcoin Co-Founder Kevin Owocki Unveils ReFi Incubator Supermodular
entry.summary: Supermodular picks up where Gitcoin Holdings left off.

entry.title: 'Snow Crash' Author Neal Stephenson Says Future of the Metaverse Won't Require Goggles
entry.summary: "It seemed like a logical assumption at the time that would be the the output device" for the metaverse, Stephenson said. "But that's not what happened."

entry.title: Just 16% of Ethereum Stakers Are in Profit Ahead of Shanghai Upgrade
entry.summary: With Ethereum's Shanghai upgrade slated for April, ETH stakers will finally be able to withdraw their holdings. But will they sell?

entry.title: Market Cap for Binance Stablecoin BUSD Plummets 43% in 30 Days
entry.summary: Just as the market cap for Binance’s stablecoin BUSD has plunged double digits in the past month, another competitor is on the rise.

entry.title: Tether Used Fake Documents to Open Bank Accounts: WSJ
entry.summary: A Friday WSJ report claims the stablecoin issuer had some shadowy backers.

entry.title: Bitcoin NFT Market to Hit $4.5 Billion by 2025: Galaxy
entry.summary: A report released Friday by analysts suggests that Bitcoin Ordinals’ wild run of the last month is only just the beginning.

entry.title: UK Crypto Crackdown: Which British Banks Allow You to Buy Bitcoin?
entry.summary: It’s getting tougher to buy and sell crypto if you bank in the U.K. These are the latest rules.

entry.title: Sorare NFTs Should Be Regulated Under 'New Category', CEO Says
entry.summary: Regulation may be headed for the NFT market, but Sorare CEO Nicolas Julia says new frameworks are needed.

entry.title: 'I Don’t Trust in Music NFTs': French Electronic Producer DJ Agoria
entry.summary: Mass adoption of music NFTs doesn't appeal to electronic music pioneer DJ Agoria. For him, the rarer the better.

entry.title: Huobi to Join BitTorrent Chain Ecosystem, Build Blockchain 'Super Network'
entry.summary: The crypto exchange will integrate with the cross-chain layer 2 solution linking Ethereum, Tron and BNB Chain.

entry.title: 'We Don't Want to Make Music NFTs Mainstream': DJ Agoria
entry.summary: French electronic music producer DJ Agoria told Decrypt's Dan Roberts what excites him most about music NFTs, how it informs his work as a generative artist, and why Web3 is all about artists exploring "new ideas that were not possible in Web2."

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Capitulation Has Been 'Completely Different' This Cycle: CoinShares
entry.summary: A CoinShares analyst said the latest downturn has been “completely different” than in the past thanks to orderly capital markets.

entry.title: Tornado Cash Contributor Builds New Privacy Tool—And Hopes It Won’t Trigger the Feds
entry.summary: Ameen Soleimani, an early contributor to Tornado, has created a fork that aims to be a better version of the blacklisted Ethereum coin mixer.

entry.title: What Is Yield Farming? Beginner's Guide
entry.summary: At its core, yield farming is a process that allows cryptocurrency holders to lock up their holdings, which in turn provides them with rewards.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Plunge as Market Mulls Silvergate Fears
entry.summary: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and the wider crypto market were hit hard on Friday morning as the industry weighs concerns around embattled Silvergate.

entry.title: U.S. Lawmakers Say SEC Directive May Bring “Greater Risk of Loss”
entry.summary: Sen. Cynthia Lummis and Rep. Patrick McHenry cite the Celsius bankruptcy in refuting an April 2022 bulletin.

entry.title: How Adidas Jumped Into Web3 and What It Plans Next
entry.summary: Adidas Web3 lead Erika Wykes-Sneyd told Decrypt's Dan Roberts the story of what prompted Adidas to get into crypto (it involves Elon Musk), what the brand has done so far with NFTs tied to physical apparel, and what it's considering next—including token-gated sneaker drops.

entry.title: Why 160-Year-Old Luxury Watch Maker Panerai Is Getting into NFTs
entry.summary: Eva Assayag, Web3 lead at Panerai, sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about Panerai's Web3 strategy, which will soon include a "digital passport" sold with every watch.

entry.title: NFT Factory President: 'NFTs Will Be Active in a Bull or Bear Market'
entry.summary: John Karp, president of NFT Factory Paris and the founder of Non-Fungible Conference Lisbon, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about the exploding Web3 community in Paris, the concept behind creating a physical gallery for NFTs, and how the existing art community understands NFTs because "everybody understands art."

entry.title: What Attracted Artist Tom Sachs to NFTs? Community and Identity
entry.summary: Tom Sachs is a conceptual artist whose work has been displayed in museums and galleries all over the world, but he told Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris he never before felt part of an art movement—until he got into NFTs and Web3. He talked about Rocket Factory and the pull of Web3 art communities.

entry.title: Arianee CEO: Big Consumer Brands Are Going to Take Web3 to 1 Billion Users
entry.summary: Pierre-Nicolas Hurstel, CEO of Arianee, which offers enterprise software to consumer brands to help them launch NFTs tied to physical goods, spoke to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris about how much the NFT space is growing despite the bear market, how big consumer brands will take crypto mainstream, and how loyalty programs are going to be the next huge use case for NFTs.

entry.title: Salesforce Web3 Lead: Every Brand's Web Site Will Support Crypto Wallets
entry.summary: Salesforce's Web3 lead Marc Mathieu sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about the CRM giant's crypto strategy, why "we had to" embrace Web3, and why the crypto wallet is "the new cookie" online.

entry.title: Doodles CEO: Why In-Person Meetups Are Crucial for NFT Communities
entry.summary: Doodles CEO Julian Holguin, former president of Billboard, sat down with Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the strong vibes at the event and the importance of IRL meetups in Web3, what's next for Doodles and the community, and his prediction that many newer projects won't survive the crypto winter.

entry.title: SuperRare Co-Founder: We Remain Committed to NFT Artist Royalties
entry.summary: SuperRare co-founder Jon Perkins sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to talk about the debate over artist royalties, SuperRare's roots in catering to artists, and building through a bear market.

entry.title: gm: Meet the Brain Behind Avalanche
entry.summary: Avalanche founder and Ava Labs CEO Emin Gun Sirer has been working on proof-of-work cryptocurrencies since before Bitcoin (seriously). He talked to Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott about how Avalanche avoided FTX and how much damage SBF has done to crypto’s image with VCs, why institutions still aren’t backing away from crypto, why Avalanche will succeed in the long run, and trying to cater to both Wall Street institutions and DeFi degens. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Founder of The Sandbox: 'Essential' to Metaverse That Users Own Their Digital Content
entry.summary: Sebastien Borget, founder and COO of the metaverse realm The Sandbox, sat down wit Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the future of the open metaverse and true digital ownership, what's next for The Sandbox, and its current user numbers and stats.

entry.title: Playboy's Next Step in Web3: MetaMansion in The Sandbox
entry.summary: Playboy's Web3 lead Liz Suman sat down with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at NFT Paris to tell the story of how the 70-year-old magazine brand got into Web3 and preview its upcoming MetaMansion in The Sandbox, which will give special access privileges to those with a Playboy Rabbitar NFT.

entry.title: Orange Comet CEO: 'We're Trying to Build the Disney of Web3'
entry.summary: Dave Broome, CEO of NFT design and production studio Orange Comet, spoke to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris about how his company takes "large, popular IP" and turns it into NFT content and Web3 worlds around it.
